text: Let's all lament the loss of the Konami that gave us this /\, people! In the early 90s, someone at their music department was board and thought id be fun to fuse Castlevania with early 90s Western hip hop, and got the OKAY from up high to produce and sell an album of it! I'm sad that THIS Konami is dead, and all that's left is them telling us to "PULL THE LEVER" :-(
